ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Slashing weapons for bards question...
ygData.msgSnippet: Like someone else just said, you really can t use a 2h slash. Personally, at 17, I was using 2 piercing weapons.  Eventually I moved to 2 slashing weapons.
ygData.messageBody:
Like someone else just said, you really can't use a 2h slash.
Personally, at 17, I was using 2 piercing weapons. Eventually I moved to 2
slashing weapons. And now at 36, I'm back to 2 piercing weapons :)

Basically, once you hit 17, you'll be dual wielding the rest of your
life. I don't know any bard that uses a shield (though it is possible)

Don't forget your 1h blunt also. Mine is only about 120 now,
instead of 185 where all my others are. It's just that to me, no 1h blunt
weapons are really that good, so I haven't really botherd with it much.



> Ok, for those who missed the last post, I am a level 7, almost 8 bard.
> Right now I am using a regular Long Sword. Not too dramatic..:)
>
> I know I get dual wield at 17, and that sounds nice but I was wondering
> what it maxes out at and if its better to get dual wield for 2 1h slashers
> or to invest in a 2h slasher like a bibs?
>
> thanks!
>
> Cerulia
> Bard of 7.8 songs, Fennin Ro
